reviewText: This CD by Wintley Phipps is truly inspiring and powerful.  His voice is definitely one of the best I've had the privilege to hear on several occasions in concert.  I don't know of any better!

This is not only a beautiful DVD, with the unbelievablely beautiful voice of Wintley Phipps, it also touches the heart with the thoughts of our Precious Lord Savior....I play this  over and over and meditate on how much Jesus loves us and what HE did for us.
Wintley Phipps is an outstanding talent whose voice and musical interpretations are superlative.  I am looking forward to obtaining more of his albums on CD.
Another great Wintley Phipps DVD. I would recommend it to anyone to watch and enjoy his singing. I love it.
He has a deep base voice and reminds me of soul music I heard out back in 30's and 40's.  Could listen to this all day.

The back drop for his songs added new meaning to his words about the ancient days of the bible.
The views and camera angles were breathtaking. My only disappointment was the length of the video, a good thing ended too quickly.

My family loved it, we watch it over and over. It is great for all ages. It makes an excellent gift.
I think it should be in every home library.
I play this music over and over again.  Wintley is such a wonderful artist and person and it shows in his musical selections.  I love this album.
